summary: Provides a set of scheduling analysis passes for the Qiskit transpiler, including infrastructure to compute operation durations, determine earliest (ASAP) and latest (ALAP) feasible start times, and record classical I/O latency metadata for use in timingâ€‘aware circuit optimization.
business_intent: Enable more efficient execution of quantum circuits on hardware by supplying precise timing information that guides scheduling, resource allocation, and latency handling during transpilation.
